alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:52PM CDT until May 09 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN AND EASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 852 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fair Grove to Springfield to near Nixa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Battlefield, Willard, Strafford, Fremont Hills, Brookline, Glidewell, Ebenezer, Bassville, Turners and Galloway. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 69, and between mile markers 72 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION with tornado like wind speeds expected. Mobile homes and high profile vehicles are especially susceptible to winds of this magnitude and may be overturned. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms have the potential to cause serious injury and significant property damage.
